title: Shop Issue
body:
Hi all

I was playing a game recently and my inventory was full-up with items - when I went to the shop it refused to show an item inventory of what I already had and the sell button could not be highlighted to sell such items.  Anyone else have this glitch or am I missing something here?

Cheers!

replies.body: Something might have messed up with the game assets associated with your shop. I'd suggest trying to run a quick repair through the client options to make sure you've got a fully working copy of League installed.
